nodes.description: 2013年5月22日，英国士兵Lee Rigby在伦敦伍尔西遇害，此事件四周年纪念成为2017年曼彻斯特恐袭背景
nodes.support_text: The Manchester attack took place on the fourth anniversary of the killing of Fusilier Lee Rigby in Woolwich, which was inspired by al-Qaeda propaganda on avenging civilian casualties in the Middle East.

nodes.description: 2017年5月23日晚，Ariana Grande演唱会期间发生自杀式爆炸，22人死亡、数十人受伤
nodes.support_text: A suicide bomber killed 22 people and injured dozens more at an Ariana Grande concert on Monday night.

nodes.description: ISIS通过阿拉伯语声明宣称对袭击负责，称实施者系'哈里发战士'
nodes.support_text: Isis has claimed responsibility for the Manchester Arena attack, hailing the bomber as a 'soldier of the caliphate'.

nodes.description: ISIS通过中央媒体发布恐袭声明，声称袭击造成百余人伤亡
nodes.support_text: The terrorist group released a statement in Arabic through its central media body praising the atrocity, claiming more than 100 people were killed or wounded.

nodes.description: ISIS最新版宣传杂志《Rumiyah》将演唱会场馆列为'理想袭击目标'
nodes.support_text: The most recent edition of its Rumiyah propaganda magazine listed concert halls among 'ideal target locations' for attacks.

nodes.description: 现场发现使用自制TATP炸药的证据，皇家物流部队部署拆弹机器人
nodes.support_text: Explosive devices using homemade triacetone triperoxide (TATP) have become a signature of the group’s largest European attacks in Paris and Brussels, and has been discovered in several foiled plots.

nodes.description: 曼彻斯特警方封锁现场并疏散人群，急救人员紧急救治伤员
nodes.support_text: Police deploy at scene of explosion in Manchester, England, at a concert in Manchester Arena AFP/Getty Images

nodes.description: 英国政府确认事件为恐怖袭击，启动重大事故调查程序
nodes.support_text: British police said early May 23 there were 'a number of confirmed fatalities' after reports of at least one explosion during a pop concert by US singer Ariana Grande.

nodes.description: 全球媒体发布37张现场影像记录事件经过，包括爆炸瞬间、救援及民众悼念画面
nodes.support_text: Manchester explosion in pictures 37 show all Manchester explosion in pictures 1/37
